text: Abdallah Lamrani (1946 â€“ 14 April 2019) was a Moroccan footballer. He played as a defender. Lamrani played for the Morocco at the 1970 FIFA World Cup. He played for the club FAR Rabat. He was also a sergeant of the Moroccan Army. He died in 2019, at the age of 72 or 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:1970 FIFA World Cup players Category:African military people Category:Moroccan footballers
title: Abdallah Lamrani
